Someone approached. He wore a shirt with a diamond logo upon it. In 
addition, he also wore a baseball cap, which he affectionately called a

moment before I continued looking out the window.

content:
I left, following the
	veteran
down the hall to that room
we would call home this year.
And for years to come.
I entered the room and the
members were gathered, talking.
They all stared at me with
welcome faces, especially
	our leader.

And then--
	I heard my name.
She looked at me with a joyous
expression... approached me...
	and then pinned me against the wall.

"you better not be shy...", she
 told me.

I swallowed, and then shed my
shell.

I put it back on when we left.

often march upon our wall.

	carts... sitting on the rug in the

Working late at night on the magic machine.
Sometimes we'd race wirelessly

."

It was just a relatively normal day.
We had just gotten home.
And the woman pulled over andnd
sheshe said...

title: 2013-10-21c "pellt2"
content:
by this time, I had moved on.
	No more time to regress.
Now then, at first I didn't like her.
In fact, I really disliked her.
	She was like all those other hyperactive
	[]f---ers who would always try to
peel back my shell
(like I was ----ing onion or something!)
 But as we began to play out
 post-lunch theatre, I started to
 like her. Myabe it was her beautiful
 Eyes or face. Whenever she smiled
 her eyes would just light up and
 her happiness was just incredibly
 contagious. Or maybe it was her
 innocent airheadedness.

or maybe it was because she tried
to reach out to me.

title: 2013-10-22a "3charcoal"
content:
Some days the balloon man came
and he gave me a balloon.
 Sometimes, the balloonman
	-not goatfooted- gave me
 a balloon and rubbed it in my
hair. As he pulled the balloon away,
my hair would stand up from the static
electricity.

When the balloonman came, it
was always a good day. When
I saw him coming in the distance
I lit up inside, but gave her
that same stoic, annoyed look.

title: 2013-10-30d4 "bio - emi"
content:
repulsive...
you eat like a cow.
	The way you chew on your sandwich
and how the peanut butter and jelly
would get stuck in your braces...
I'm fighting back the urge to vomit, honestly.

and you're trying to steal her
 from me.

title: 2013-10-30e "pellt4"
content:
It was after the promotion dance.
It was late, but it was summer
	so the sun was still setting.
We were standing outside. She wore a
beautiful frilly orange dress
	(Or maybe it was white and
	 the sunset tinted it)
She leaned towards me, kissed me.
 I swooned
	and woke up.

title: 2013-10-30f "awake"
content:
I stared at the person before
  me. I guess they felt a tiny bit
  of sympathy for me. Maybe
	they wanted to see me active...
	they wanted to see me shine.
  Or maybe they wanted to make
  their friends laugh.
And it wasn't just this person.
It was everyone. They all fooled me.
"pellt", "shawd", and all the others.
	Except...
  except maybe...

--
Please, allow me to regress.

the antimoon
rose
